title: Drama continues in TN, Assembly adjourned again till 3 PM. Here are 10 developments till now
text:
NEW DELHI: In a first trust vote in Tamil Nadu Assembly after 29 years, drama continues in the state as Assembly convened for Palaniswami 's trust vote witnessed repeated chaos in the House. 

Here are the 10 developments that happened in the Assembly: 

1 As soon as designated CM Palaniswami moved the trust vote motion in the Assembly, ruckus erupted in the Assembly as DMK MLAs started shouting slogans in support of Panneerselvam . 

2 Supported by Congress, DMK and IUMI, Panneerselvam camp requested for a secret ballot. 

3 But, Speaker P. Dhanapal turned down the request for secret ballot and postponing the trust vote. Announced voice vote in six blocks. 

4 First block of 38 MLAs voted in favour of Palaniswami, but the floor test was halted due to chaos. 

5. Speaker allowed MK Stalin and Panneerselvam to speak. 

6 Ruckus went out of control when DMK MLAs jumped into the well of the House and started tearing paper, tried climbing the Speaker chair and threw microphone demanding secret ballot. 

7 Speaker adjourned the Assembly till 1 pm. 

8 Assembly reassembled at 1 pm and Speaker orders assembly police to evict DMK legislators. 

9 DMK MLAs decided to sit on dharna inside Tamil Nadu assembly premises. 

10 Assembly adjourned till 3 pm.
